channel.title: How do i make a keyauth dll library and call it from c#?
channel.description:
hello people,
so what i'm trying to do is implement keyauth inside a dll library and call it from a c# program, the c++ lib will simply try to login to keyauth and return the output (or either true false).
i'm not too familiar with c++ so any kind of sample is appreciated
